title: The Best of The Best Meat Erotica
description: Fiction. Erotica. Hungry? This year's--and perhaps the decade's--most imaginative and thought-provoking erotic anthology serves up a mouth-watering feast of desire, lust and ravenous hunger, carnivorous appetites, and deliciously sexy adventures. 20 wicked, shamelessly naughty, outrageous--and at times--not to be believed. Put the kids to bed, set the table, grab an extra-large bib, and get ready...DINNER'S SERVED!
author: Greg Wharton
